statements: DELETE FROM NFTEvents WHERE id = 100 AND event_type = 'Transfer';
DELETE FROM NFTEvents WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice' AND event_action = 'Mint';
DELETE FROM triggered_actions WHERE nft_id = 100 AND nft_owner = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM Trigger_History WHERE success = false;
DELETE FROM Triggers WHERE action_type = 'mint' AND trigger_name = 'New Mint Trigger';
DELETE FROM Trigger_History WHERE success = true;
DELETE FROM TriggerActions WHERE action_timestamp < '2023-01-01' AND action_type = 'Cancel';
DELETE FROM nft_tokens WHERE token_name = 'Example Token';
